translations: v．爬行，缓慢行进：以慢速、低姿态移动，通常用于描述婴儿、动物或者某种缓慢的行进方式。
· The baby crawled across the floor.

phrs.translation: 慢行通过的空间；供电线或水管等通过的槽隙

sentences.sentence: I crawled out of bed at nine-thirty.
They looked really comical as they crawled up precarious ladders.
sentences.translation: 他们爬上摇摇晃晃的梯子时，看起来真滑稽。

sentences.sentence: He crawled from print to print, sniffing at the earth, following the scent left in the tracks.
sentences.translation: 他从一个脚印爬到另一个脚印，嗅着泥土，跟着路上留下的气味。
